div.p: REGALE a magnificent entertainment or treat, given to ambaiſadors and other perſons of diſtinction, to entertain or do them honour.
It is uſual in Italy, at the arriv∙al of a traveller of eminence, to ſend him a regale, that is, a prefent of ſweetmeats, fruits, ,&c. by way of refreſhment.
